title: Shengeza High School's 100% NSC Pass Rate
content: On the 5th of March 2025, Shengeza High School proudly hosted a prestigious event to celebrate the outstanding achievements of the Grade 12 Class of 2024...
The celebration brought together various esteemed stakeholders...
The event was graced by Pastor P. Masiza...
📈 Total Pass Rate: 100% 🎓 Bachelor Passes: 59 📚 Diploma Passes: 28 📜 Higher Certificate Passes: 4
This achievement is a testament to the hard work...

title: Shengeza High School Achieves 100% Matric Pass Rate!
content: We are overjoyed to announce a historic milestone...
Under the visionary leadership of our principal...
The Class of 2024 has set a new benchmark...
This achievement is more than just numbers...
Together, we are shaping a legacy of excellence...
